column1: Smoque BBQ////Be prepared to wait in line
column2: as this über-popular bbq joint always draws a crowd. Once you're in the place
column3: you'll be greeted with a tremendous aroma of smoked meats and sweet bbq-sauce - quite heavenly.  Prices are a bit on the high-side
column4: but you really do get what you pay for - quality bbq that's super tender and has been cooked to perfection.
